original_title: Aaron Austin: A Day In The Life
overview: Aaron Austin is trying to hook up with Andrew Clay. But he keeps running up against Jon Vincent and Brian Hart. But with the help of Danny Summers, he gets his man. Confusing? Perhaps. Provocative? Always. A day in the life of Aaron Austin? Definitely.
tagline: A day in the life of a super stud, a provocative turn on scenery.
title: Aaron Austin: A Day In The Life
